data.name: Truck Life-Gansu
data.detailed_description:
Drive from Zhejiang to Gansu

Take a train at Huzhou Railway Station to Lanzhou Railway Station

Giant map area

Compared to the existing map area, Gansu’s map area has expanded several times.

Complex and varied landscapes

Highland, plain, desert, and Gobi desert. You can enjoy in just one DLC.

New special quests

New special quests will be unlocked when new cities is unlocked.

[h2New vehicle and new AI[/h2]
First authorized vehicle Hyundai Xcient and lots of AI vehicles.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Amazing map area, Varied landscapes, Brand new special quests, New vehicle and New AI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
